name: Unibility
description:
This game was made in about 12 hours for the Game Makers Toolkit Gamejam 2019.

Unibility is a simple puzzle-platformer where can only hold 1 ability at a time, so you have to swap them out as needed.

Credits:

Design/Programming/Most things - Sam Tregillus
Music - PlayOnLoop.com
Art Assets - Kenny.nl
